title: Matt Mercury: Plot of the Galactic Mastermind
features: A fun, family space adventure just for kids, but with all the retro-silly banter adults will love. Matt Mercury, Plot of the Galactic Mastermind is the novelization of an innovative new feature film that recalls all the colorful fun we remember from space-operas of the 1960s and 1970s. In the future, the way it used to be a heroic star-pilot Matt Mercury must take an untried starship on a break-neck race across the galaxy to save the Earth and capture an evil, mutant, super-genius. This exciting space adventure features blue-haired cuties, Rocket-aces, robotic-beans, inarticulate cyclopes, speaking apes and Matt's very own half house-cat girlfriend. Will Matt return the Earth to its orbit or will the galaxy forever be controlled by the Mastermind? Illustrated by the author and includes 16 exclusive photos from the film!
description: Bill Hughes - Star Wars artist, comic-book creator, filmmaker and writer.

Cosby', 'about': ['Multi-Award Winning and International Bestselling author Braxton A. Cosby is a dreamer who transitioned his ideas from pen and paper to pixels and keyboards. He has penned over 18 novels, comics, and several screenplays, many based on his own works. He tells stories that evoke emotions and stimulates thought. THE STARCROSSED SAGA, BROKEN, and THE CAPE are currently Young Adult, Zombie, and Superhero series he created, with spins-offs for INFINITY 7 and his International Bestseller Bounty Hunter Sci-Fi release, STEEL REIGN: FLIGHT OF THE STARSHIP CONCORD. He has published 4 comics under Starchild Comics, which he serves as the CEO, along with the same title for Cosby Media Productions.
